properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 19 at 12:00AM PST until February 19 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing temperatures 28 to 32 degrees Fahrenheit.

* WHERE...The south-central Oregon Coast including Reedsport,
North Bend, Coos Bay and Lakeside.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freezing conditions are likely to severely
damage or even kill frost and freeze sensitive vegetation and
could, possibly, damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Prolonged sub-freezing temperatures are
most likely to occur in areas blocked from easterly winds,
especially in low spots such as bogs and hollows.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes. wrap and
drain them, or allow them to drip slowly during the period of
below freezing temperatures. Those that have in-ground sprinkler
systems should drain them and cover above-ground pipes to protect
them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY
